de.unisiegen.tpml.core.prettyprinter
Class BuilderItem

java.lang.Object
  de.unisiegen.tpml.core.prettyprinter.AbstractItem
      de.unisiegen.tpml.core.prettyprinter.BuilderItem

final class BuilderItem
extends AbstractItem

This class represents a pretty string builder that is added to another pretty string builder.

Version:
$Rev: 277 $
Author:
Benedikt Meurer
See Also:
AbstractItem, DefaultPrettyStringBuilder

          Allocates a new BuilderItem for the specified builder.

          Returns the length of the string in characters required to serialize this item to a pretty string.
